page.title: 04Gargrave, Industry.
page.content: The only factory in Gargrave belongs to{Johnson and Johnson,}an American firm who in Gargrave make surgical dressings, swabs, bandages, cotton buds, face masks, cotton wool, 'J-cloth' and many{other products all {based on cotton} Johnson and Johnson have had a factory here for 50 years, on a site of 90 acres. The factory now covers 160,000 sq. ft. There are 600 {employees,}many of them from Skipton, and from villages near Gargrave. 20% of their products are{exported}and ten wagon loads are collected each day. The factory has a{Social Club}for employees and their families.
